## TriggerConfig type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type TriggerConfig = {
    focusTrigger?: boolean;
    onlineTrigger?: boolean;
    timerTrigger?: false | number;
    triggers?: <Data>(data: Data) => Observable<unknown>[];
};
```
